title: On the issues: Josh Harder and Tom Patti on abortion, the economy, homelessness
dc:creator: Terry Castleman
description: Here's where Democrat Rep. Josh Harder and Republican challenger Tom Patti stand on abortion, jobs, taxes, homelessness and the 2020 election.
content:encoded: Here's where Democrat Rep. Josh Harder and Republican challenger Tom Patti stand on abortion, jobs, taxes, homelessness and the 2020 election.

media:content.media:description: From L-R, Josh Harder, Tom Patti
